newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy's Perugia sees November CPI at 2.9 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Italy's Perugia sees November CPI at 2.9 pct yr/yr.

text.p: The Italian city of Perugia said its November consumer price index stood at -0.2 percent month-on-month and 2.9 percent year-on-year.
In October, Perugia's inflation rate was 0.1 percent and 3.9 percent respectively.
Perugia is one of 10 Italian cities publishing inflation data on Thursday and Friday.
The city's CPI has a weighting of 1.26 percent on the national index. The 10 sample cities have a combined weighting of 69.67 percent on the total index.
